name: FH Technikum Moodle Restyle
description:
Restyles FH Technikum Wien Moodle:
  • New custom metro styled icons for various file types (e.g. .pdf, .docx, .txt, .mpeg, ...)
  • Logo padding& positioning adjustments
  • Sidebar collaps icons only show on hover
  • Restyled login page& Back-To-Top Button...
  • Sublte background image
  • Much more coming soon...
